name: Safer aterineto
description:
Internet is full of dangers: cyberbullying, insults and threats, offensive or discriminatory comments...

Parents! How to ensure Social media has a positive effect on your child's mental health?
Collect positive vibes and share them around you.

Command

Left, Right, Up, Down to move

Space to give positive vibe

Escape to quit game

A prototype game made during "safer internet game jam" organized by Youth First Madagascar
